title: Config and Connection-Tab not visible when moving to secondary Monitor
author: HondaBey
body_snippet:
When moving the tabs Config or Connections to a secondary Display (to have fullscreen for Remote-Desktops), the are not visible anymore after resart the machine.

## Expected Behavior
Show config tabs at the position when it was closed the last time

## Current Behavior
No possibiltiy to bring back the config tab or the connections tab. Even when i deactivate and reactivate them by main View-Menu.
Reinstallation of application is necessary

iterations.description: High DPI scaling issue causing dock panels to vanish on secondary monitors; likely requires explicit WM_DPICHANGED handling to refresh the DockPanel layout.

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet: Does the View menu -> Reset Layout function work in this situation?

comments.author: italianjoe69
comments.snippet: @sparerd Thank you.  That did fix my issue.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): High DPI scaling issue causing dock panels to vanish on secondary monitors; likely requires explicit WM_DPICHANGED handling to refresh the DockPanel layout.
Approach: Override WndProc in FrmMain to handle WM_DPICHANGED and force DockPanel layout refresh.
